website_summaries.verdict: Durable workmanship and an attractive storage bag that are ideal for novice bonsai hobbyists who only need basic yet useful bonsai tools.
pros: Sturdy tools at an affordable price
Designed for basic bonsai growing needs, such as soil prep and plant pruning
Owners like that they are also practical for succulents
cons: Rare reports of missing pieces upon delivery
Only 7 tools – not ideal for bonsai enthusiasts who need more for their craft

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... so many other positive reviews so I thought this would be what I was looking for to help out with my indoor plants. But it arrived in what looks to be used condition? The shovel is rusted and has scrapes all over it. It’s also not as curved as I thought it would be... The bag the snips came in was completely ripped, and the folding scissors were hazardous to fold and unfold. Going to have to keep looking. Could be cute, I guess, if you get a new set!
customer_reviews.author: megthemaker

customer_reviews.title: Love this little kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my growing collection of succulents, which is often working with small plants and containers. These are *perfect* for small work. P-E-R-F-E-C-T. They're very easy to use, the shears are very sharp (watch out!), and the size is perfect for terrariums and small projects. All told they're about the length from the base of my palm to the tips of my fingers. Great price, and it came early which is always a fun surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Clairmont

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny kit. It is so cute, compact (it comes with a bag), and useful. I don’t use it for Bonsai. I use it for urban gardening. I particularly like the tiny scissors to cut off yellowing leaves, and the brush to brush dirt off of herbs. What an awesome addition the brush is.
customer_reviews.author: Homestead maker

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and rusty tools and larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviewers that these tools have small signs of rust and scratches. It's also a little bigger than I expected. Don't buy this if your bonsai is in a pot smaller than 5-6 inches. There's also little to no weight to the handle so it feels sort of weak.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of tools -- nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit very much. I haven't used it so much on my bonsai tree because it died (or I killed it, lol) before I had a chance to use the kit on it, but it works just as nice for other smaller plants. I would recommend this product if you are looking for a smaller set of tools to use for smaller, potted plants.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndication

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: Not very good build quality . Shovel started to break after a few uses . I bought this my bonsai hobby
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gull

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves her own tools
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old granddaughter loves using her tools to tend to her bonsai trees.
customer_reviews.author: Deni

customer_reviews.title: Will last for many years
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for working on SHOHIN .... so glad I spotted them!
customer_reviews.author: JanVan

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai Growing Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for the purpose and equally nice price. They will be used for my first bonsai and anytime a small tool is more efficient that the regular size tools.
customer_reviews.author: B A Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for family member who loves fussing with her indoor plants over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Love the small storage pouch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone. They loved the storage pouch to keep all the tools together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a patio gardener, pots and plants don't get very big. The size is perfect for this. He has good sized hands, and he has no problem using them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Busser

customer_reviews.title: ... was complete and I really can't say that I'm disappointed. The material used was a little on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was complete and I really can't say that I'm disappointed. The material used was a little on the cheap side but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Messick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Shipped quickly. Love the bag! Keeps all your tools in one place.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set of garden tools! It’s perfect for my desert plant garden and is easy to store in a shed or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for a small inside garden and bonsai trees
customer_reviews.author: Ladysilver

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have several mini succulents, as well as a very young African Violet, and these tools are useful for all of my plants!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer in person than online. Would make a nice gift for a gardener or anyone with a green thumb. I love the little shears that safely fold the blades away and trimmer is super cute for deadheading. The large tweezers are great for getting bugs off of your veggie plants. Great set for the price!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tools. They are sturdy and user friendly. I love that I comes with its own little pouch to put things away in. I use it mainly for my succulents and they have definitely come in handy. Totally recommend it and the price is fair for the quality you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yotek Bonsai Tree Growing Kit Succulent Gardening Tools Set of 8 pcs - Include Pruner, Fold Scissors, Mini Rake, Bud, Cleaning Brush & Leaf Trimmer (8pcs)
product_meta.description:
Color:8pcsPls note:
The color of the hemp carry bag & Bonsai scissors are varied.
There is some oil on top of the pruning scissors to keep it from rusty.
To preserve the fine edges, do not use these tools to cut wire.
Clean after every use, pat dry and lightly oil.
This basic tool set is perfect for trimming all plants.
Package:
1 X 4 in/ 10cm Bonsai Pruning Stainless Steel scissors
1 X 4 in/ 10cm Folding Scissor 
1 X 6.7 in/ 17cm wooden rake 
2 X 7.5 in/ 19cm wooden spades 
1 X 6.5 in/ 16cm Stainless Steel tweezers 
1 X 5.3in/ 13.5cm wooden cleaning brush 
1 X 9.8*7in/ 25*18cm hemp carry bag
feature_bullets: Firmer & Bigger construction: Suitable size of the rake & spades kit. Handy for small size bonsai tree or succulents.
Pack with a hemp carrying pouch to get all the tools in order.(pattern varies)
Special design of the tweezers to grip tiny staff on pot much easily.
Powerful 8 pcs pack. Whether you are a garden beginner or bonsai enthusiast, these are the basic tool set you need.
Ideal for bonsai, herb, or other plants. Also a great little kit for young children to the joy of indoor gardening. We also get free ebook for begninners, pls contact us if you are interested.
